topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mail Transport Agents

name: OWASendMail
short_description: OWASendMail is java utility that sends mail with your Exchange 2000/2003 account. It also acts as a SMTP server to receive the mail you want to send through your MS Exchange (2000/2003) account.
